timeline.bodyText: didn't we change this to "Key Manager doesn't support generating OAuth applications"?
timeline.author: bhathiya
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -317,7 +317,7 @@
     KEY_MANAGER_NOT_FOUND(901403, "Key Manager not found", 400, "Key Manager not found"),
     KEY_MANAGER_NAME_EMPTY(901404,
             "Key Manager name cannot be empty", 400,"Key Manager name cannot be empty"),
-    KEY_MANAGER_NOT_SUPPORT_OAUTH_APP_CREATION(901404, "Key Manager doesn't support Oauth application generation", 400,
+    KEY_MANAGER_NOT_SUPPORT_OAUTH_APP_CREATION(901405, "Key Manager doesn't support to Generate Client Application", 400,

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/components/apimgt/org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.api/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/apimgt/api/ExceptionCodes.java b/components/apimgt/org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.api/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/apimgt/api/ExceptionCodes.java
index c093575932d..36df319d0c6 100644
--- a/components/apimgt/org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.api/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/apimgt/api/ExceptionCodes.java
+++ b/components/apimgt/org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.api/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/apimgt/api/ExceptionCodes.java

@@ -317,8 +317,8 @@ ExceptionCodes implements ErrorHandler {
     KEY_MANAGER_NOT_FOUND(901403, "Key Manager not found", 400, "Key Manager not found"),
     KEY_MANAGER_NAME_EMPTY(901404,
             "Key Manager name cannot be empty", 400,"Key Manager name cannot be empty"),
-    KEY_MANAGER_NOT_SUPPORT_OAUTH_APP_CREATION(901405, "Key Manager doesn't support to Generate Client Application", 400,
-            "Key Manager doesn't support to Generate Client Application"),
+    KEY_MANAGER_NOT_SUPPORT_OAUTH_APP_CREATION(901405, "Key Manager doesn't support generating OAuth applications", 400,
+            "Key Manager doesn't support generating OAuth applications"),
     KEY_MANAGER_NOT_SUPPORTED_TOKEN_GENERATION(901405, "Key Manager doesn't support token generation", 400,
             "Key Manager doesn't support token generation"),
     KEY_MANAGER_NOT_ENABLED(901406, "Key Manager is not enabled in the system", 400,
